output.sentences: As I enter the Barret Jackson Car show, the fist thing I see is a vintage motorcycle that I am completely mesmerized by.
After looking at the first motorcycle, all my focus is what others are at this show so I walk over the line of blue ones I see a couple of lanes over.
It didn't take long for me to spot the beautiful feminine yellow one across the room and soon enough I'm right in front of it gawking at its design.
The last one that caught my eye was a bright shiny green bike that had me completely under is spell.
After finishing looking at all the bikes I like, I stand in confusion trying to decide which one I wanted; nonetheless this is the most difficult decision I will probably ever make.
